original_text: And you, being dead in your sins and the uncircumcision of your flesh, hath he quickened together with him, having forgiven you all trespasses;
korean_text: 또 범죄와 육체의 무할례로 죽었던 너희를 하나님이 그와 함께 살리시고 우리의 모든 죄를 사하시고

sentences.original_text: And you, being dead in your sins
and the uncircumcision of your flesh
hath he quickened together with him
